name: KOTH
description: Climb your way to the top of the map and defeat the Koth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 2 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 Storage: 5 MB available space
